name: Rolling Magnet (Gamungu)
description:
Roll the magnet, interact with opposite magnetic poles and solve the puzzles. It gets harder and challenging. You need to think carefully and calculate ways to solve the puzzles.

CONTROLS:  

  • Navigate through the MENU with KEYBOARD.
  • A and D to move the Magnet
  • SPACE to interact with magnets.
  • R restart level.  ESC return to menu.  M mute the sound.
